branchCategory.name: TRTU
branchCategory.description: <P>Series TRTU flame resistance three-layer tubing is suitable for air and water piping in environments where sparks from arc welders, etc., may be a problem.  The three-layer design uses a flame resistant polyolefin (equivalent to UL-94 Standard V-0) for the outer area.  The TRTU series is available in a variety of colors and sizes and is RoHS compliant.</P> <P> </P>

branchItem.name: TRTU, Flame Resistant Three-Layer Polyurethane Tubing
branchItem.description: <P>Series TRTU flame resistance three-layer tubing is suitable for air and water piping in environments where sparks from arc welders, etc., may be a problem.  The three-layer design uses a flame resistant polyolefin (equivalent to UL-94 Standard V-0) for the outer area.  The TRTU series is available in a variety of colors and sizes and is RoHS compliant.</P> <P> </P>
branchItem.bullets: <UL> <LI>FR three-layer polyurethane tubing <LI>Flame resistant <LI>Equivalent to UL-94 standard V-0 <LI>20m & 100m reels available <LI>Several color options available <LI>RoHS compliant</LI></UL>
